elements.name: Forgot password test using the valid email ID.

steps.name: user is already on the login page
title of the login page is 'Binary Fountain Login - Binary Fountain'
user finds the Forgot Password link on the login page
user click on the Forgot Password link then forgot password page opens
user find the Next button which is in inactive state
user enters the Valid Email ID then Next button becomes Active
user clicks on the Next button then it goes to the reset Password page
use 'Verification Email to rest/update password option' is selected by default
user Clicks on the Submit button

description: This feature is to test the login functionality for tools-etl.dev application
